column2: marathon-grandmama, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month
column9: Caution Athletes  - this drug can cause heat stroke. It blocks your ability to sweat and regulate your body temperature. I found out the hard way!

column2: adbook, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I have taken this medication for one month and has helped with the diarrhea for a couple of weeks, then severely  constipated and made me nauseous.  Reduced the dosage but did not help.  Still had no control for the diarrhea.

column9: IBS-C.  This medication has lessened all symptoms.  Still effective after two years of daily use.

column2: taz042373, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: This is a life saver. IBS for years with diarehha.  Perscribe pamine 2x a day.. Works so well I only need to take 1 pill a day.  Bowel movements are normal for the first time in years.  I can eat things I havent eaten in years.  Can't say enough about this drug.  Do have dry mouth but who cares.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I have been using Pamine Fote for my severe IBS.  This is a miracle drug!  It relieves stomach pain within 10 minutes of taking it.  I highly reccomend it!!

column2: Laurie, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I have tried everything under the sun for my severe IBS. Nothing has worked even slightly like Pamine Forte. It definitely causes dry mouth, scratchy throat, but it is so worth it because it helps ease my symptoms during a flare up so that it's possible for me to be in public, have a semi-normal life! Works in about 20 minutes or so, taking 2.5 mg - 5 mg at a time. Life saver!

column9: i use this drug for irritable bowel syndrome and it is very successful and decreasing the symptoms
